attributes.action: instruct the DCSF to explore and learn from the most famous examples of co-operative & democratic schools, Summerhill and St Georges-in-the-East.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 1949 HMI recommended that all educationalists should visit A.S.Neill's Summerhill, and in 1948 HMI said that St Georges was the face of the future of state modern schools. Let us, the DCSF, and our schools, learn from this advice about these pioneering schools.
